description:
"You have an adorable accent… Where's it from?"
"England," Zach replied.
"Really? What the hell are you doing over here?"
"You know, just hanging out, enjoying California."
Because of his olive skin and dark hair, Zach isn't exactly the type you'd expect to be from rainy London.
"Most people think I'm Mediterranean," he explained. "Until I open my mouth."
Zach has a story that I've heard before. He moved to America to be with a girl he met abroad. They broke up and he decided to stay.
"I'm having too much fun," he said, flashing a really cute smile.
Once he was undressed, I noticed another surprise... a nice, hairy chest!
title: Zach
